article_title: Do Fed Policies Help Restore Income Inequality?

article_metadata.author: Erik Sherman

og.description: Wall Street Journal reporter Rolfe Winkler asked a colleague an interesting question on Twitter last week: "Do Fed policy discussions ever address record income inequality that is direct result of asset prices they're inflating?" The question has a curious context these days. Income inequality has suddenly become all the rage [...]
